QuestData.Title: Fog Wards
QuestData.Description: Trainee.$b$bSeveral wards surround us, hidden in the woods near my home. They are quite effective at dispersing the mist, but they require constant upkeep.$b$bYou will find one to the north, one to the west, and one to the south. Find these wards and light them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Light the Northern Fog Ward, the Western Fog Ward, and the Southern Fog Ward.
QuestData.CompletionText: See if you can light one of the wards while one of the mist incarnations is nearby.
